霊体験: (れいたいけん) - experience of seeing a ghost
霊前: (れいぜん) - before the spirit of the deceased
霊剣: (れいけん) - sword possessing mystical powers; virtuous sword
霊友会: (れいゆうかい) - Reiyukai (Buddhist sect founded in 1919 as an offshoot of Nichiren Buddhism)
霊台: (れいだい) - observatory for astronomy, cloud-watching, etc.; astronomical expert; place where the soul is located
霊台方寸: (れいだいほうすん) - heart; soul
霊名: (れいめい) - Christian name; baptismal name
霊域: (れいいき) - sacred ground; sacred precincts
霊夢: (れいむ) - revelatory dream; revelation; a vision
霊屋: (たまや) - mausoleum; (temporary) resting place of a corpse
霊徳: (れいとく) - wondrous virtue; miraculous virtue
霊感: (れいかん) - inspiration/afflatus; ability to sense the supernatural (esp. ghosts, etc.)
霊感商法: (れいかんしょうほう) - (yoji) fraudulent way of business, cajoling people into buying articles for an extremely high price by claiming they will bring good luck
霊泉: (れいせん) - miraculous spring or fountain
霊異: (りょうい) - miracle; wonder; wondrous thing
霊的交感: (れいてきこうかん) - (yoji) spiritual sympathy; spiritual communion
霊的交流: (れいてきこうりゅう) - (yoji) spiritual sympathy; spiritual communion
霊石: (れいせき) - miraculous stone; magical rock
霊祭: (れいさい) - ceremony honouring the spirits of ancestors (esp. the Bon festival)
霊祭り: (たままつり) - ceremony honouring the spirits of ancestors (esp. the Bon festival)
霊肉一致: (れいにくいっち) - (yoji) unity of body and spirit
霊芝: (れいし) - bracket fungus; Ganoderma lucidum (formerly Fomes japonicus)
霊薬: (れいやく) - unusually effective medicine; miracle drug
霊視商法: (れいししょうほう) - (yoji) fraudulent sale of exorcism services (to people led to believe that they are possessed by evil spirits)
霊送り: (たまおくり) - sending off the spirits of the dead
霊長: (れいちょう) - leader with miraculous powers; humanity
霊長目: (れいちょうもく) - Primates (order of mammals)
霊験: (れいけん) - miraculous efficacy; miracle; miraculous virtue
霊験あらたか: (れいけんあらたか) - miraculous; wonder-working; magical
霊魂不滅: (れいこんふめつ) - (yoji) immortality of the soul
霏々: (ひひ) - incessant falling (e.g. rain, snow); prolonged continuation (of something)
霏霏: (ひひ) - incessant falling (e.g. rain, snow); prolonged continuation (of something)
霑う: (うるおう) - to be moist/to be damp/to get wet/to be watered; to profit by/to receive benefits/to receive favors (favours); to become rich/to become at ease financially
霙: (えい) - Granizo, granizo; lascas de daikon, daikon ralado; raspadinha coberta com mel
霜が降りる: (しもがおりる) - to become frosted; to become frosty
霜よけ: (しもよけ) - covering which protects against frost
霜を置いた: (しもをおいた) - gray; grey; frosted; hoary
霜剣: (そうけん) - cold sharp sword; blade of ice
霜囲い: (しもがこい) - covering which protects against frost
霜月: (そうげつ) - eleventh month of the lunar calendar
霜枯れ: (しもがれ) - nipped by frost; bleak
霜枯れる: (しもがれる) - to be withered or nipped by frost
霜枯れ時: (しもがれどき) - winter (season); slack or off season
霜柱: (しもばしら) - frost columns; ice needles
霜降: (しもふり) - speckled with white/salt and pepper (colour, color); (of fabric) created by intertwining white and coloured fibres; (of beef) marbling; (of fish, chicken, shellfish, etc.) blanching by exposure to boiling and then icy water
霜降り: (shimofuri) - speckled with white, salt-and-pepper (padrão, tecido, etc.); marbling (of beef) , speckled with white, salt-and-pepper (pattern, fabric, etc.); marbling (of beef); formation of frost
霜降り作り: (しもふりづくり) - fish, chicken, shellfish, etc. blanched by exposure to boiling and then icy water
霜降り月: (しもふりづき) - eleventh lunar month
霜降月: (しもふりづき) - eleventh lunar month
霜除け: (しもよけ) - covering which protects against frost
